H0.text: where is the meridian that is opposite the prime meridian located. Countermeridian

H1.text: where is the meridian that is opposite the prime meridian located. Opposite Meridian

H2.text: where is the meridian that is opposite the prime meridian located. Reverse Meridian

H3.text: where is the meridian that is opposite the prime meridian located. antimeridian

A4.text: The 180th meridian or antimeridian is the meridian 180Â° both east and west of the prime meridian in a geographical coordinate system.

A5.text: The antimeridian passes mostly through the open waters of the Pacific Ocean but also runs across land in Russia, Fiji, and Antarctica.
